description:
With the Mino Three now on his side, Nobunaga attacks Inabayama Castle. Tatsuoki ends up letting the Oda forces into the castle and loses his mind and goes to look for the women who always waited on him. However, the woman he found was...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Notice of the End of Being a Shut-In
引きこもり終了のお知らせ
